name: .CUSTOMTANK File Extension
summary: Learn about .CUSTOMTANK files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a CUSTOMTANK file in Wee Tanks! (Windows, Mac). To do so:
Place the file in your Documents/​My Games/​Wee Tanks/​custom_tanks directory.
Open Wee Tanks! and begin creating or editing a custom campaign.
After your campaign loads, select the custom tank creation tab. Then, select Add.
When the Custom Tank Editor appears, select Load Tank to load the tank your CUSTOMTANK file contains.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
